{"step_by_step_thinking": "Fenestri vestibuli refers to the oval opening posterosuperior to the promontory. The other options are not correct. A is incorrect because the rounded bulge produced by the first turn of the cochlea is called the modiolus. C is incorrect because the prominence produced due to the lateral semicircular canal is called the ampulla. D is incorrect because the structure grooved by the tympanic plexus is the promontory.", "answer_choice": "B"}
